title: The science of digital music and why analog isn’t actually better
description:
Neil Young says digital music recordings are terrible quality. Is he right?

Featuring: 
Robert Owen (https://www.oberlin.edu/robert-owen)
@danideahl

Links:
How Well Can You Hear Audio Quality?
Vinyl's great, but it's not better than CDs
24/192 Music Downloads...and why they make no sense
Neil Young says the MacBook Pro has ‘Fisher-Price’ audio quality

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
